extendedInfo.description: "With all the polish of a major, mainstream release, Yesterday is not a game to be missed." (Gamezebo)"An experience you'll be unlikely to forget." (Joystiq)"Yesterday will sate the needs of adventure game fans." (Destructoid)"The game feels like a painting come to life." (Strategy Informer)"One of the best point-and-click adventure games to come along in recent memory."  (Gamezone)The first thriller by the indie studio that created the million-selling Runaway saga!A psycho is killing beggars alive in New York. A Y-shaped scar forms in the hands of seemingly unrelated people. The press and the media just don't care, so Henry White, a young NGO volunteer, will be the first to investigate the crimes with his friend Cooper.  They are two of the three playable characters in Yesterday, the third being none other than the enigmatic John Yesterday, who is dragged into this twisted plot after his memory is completely wiped.How far will you go to find out who John Yesterday is?An adult, noir thriller full of unexpected twists and turns.A magnificient visual style that mixes videogames, movies and comics.An innovative interface based on innumerable blow-ups. A perfect game for your tablet!Useful and well-designed help for players, via a hotspot marker and text hints.A rich musical score that not only fits but also enhances the story.A storyline full of discrete references and tributes to movies, series, games, music and novels.

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: This game is just amazing. It has a great story, great athmosphere, alternative endings, twists and turns in the plot. I enjoyed it very much. The buttons should  be bigger. Its hard to press them sometimes. And buy the game to support the devs. I hope they make a sequel to this:))
reviews.author: Catalin Voicu

reviews.title: Excellent quest!
reviews.comment: Really brings back the enjoyment of quests from the past. Great plot and graphics!  Definitely buy the game to support the developers!  Please make a sequel! ! !
reviews.author: Jonathan Salomon

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Probably the best point and click game I\'ve played on a mobile device. Great animation, voice overs, gameplay, and the game really makes you think. Very intuitive, I am looking forward to see more games like this from the developer. 5/5
reviews.author: Reiger Fraites

reviews.title: Best adventure game ever
reviews.comment: This was one of the best adventure games I have ever played. The story was intriguing and the gameplay is addictive. Cant wait for more.
reviews.author: Arthur Hayes

reviews.title: Fantastic game
reviews.comment: Well worth the money for an amazing point and click adventure game that delivers a truly engaging story.
reviews.author: Grant Beckmann

reviews.title: Well worth the money
reviews.comment: A very smart, well written game for android. I recommend it for anyone!
reviews.author: Cody Scheibner

reviews.title: Not a great game.
reviews.comment: For a game that\'s meant to be played on a relatively small screen, it sure is hard to find the hotspots for clicking. I spend a lot of time just tapping my screen at random trying to get my character to go somewhere.  The ui is unintuitive. Messages are variations of \"you can\'t do that\" and \"you can\'t go there\". Why show the hand icon when I can\'t pick up an item? Just to say \"you can\'t carry that item\". Or the magnifying glass for useless items? That\'s just more wasted taps on my screen.
reviews.author: A Kessaris

reviews.title: HTC one
reviews.comment: Works fine on my galaxy note. At first this game wouldn\'t work on my HTC one; I couldn\'t drag or drop items but now after a restart it works. Odd.
reviews.author: John McNichol

reviews.title: Fantabulously awesome game!
reviews.comment: Totally loved this game, had played some on adsupported model but figured i _had_ to chip in some money for it, you guys rock and i\'m hoping for more of this kind of came!
reviews.author: Christer Jamtang

reviews.title: Great game, wish it had a rating
reviews.comment: This game was great, deep storyline and great gameplay. The story contains some scary elements, adult themes, and fowl language. I wish this was rated higher, just to keep the younger audiences safe. Other than that, great game.
reviews.author: Matt Reiner

reviews.title: Great game with a awesome story telling
reviews.comment: Story is a bit short but every bit as intense and the dark story is like a page turner... Music and audio work is really good too
reviews.author: Enrique Tang

reviews.title: Great story
reviews.comment: Given it a 5 due to it being the first game I\'ve really enjoyed in a very very long time. From an old school point and click fan.
reviews.author: James Diable

reviews.title: Kept me amused for hours!
reviews.comment: Fantastic game, really made me think, fantastic animation. One of the best I have played :)
reviews.author: jamie kennesdy

reviews.title: Loved it!
reviews.comment: The only fault I see with it are the tiny option buttons, but it\'s easily the best game of its kind that I\'ve played so far on an Android device.
reviews.author: Angela Williams

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great game! Imaginative, captivating and fun. The twists and turns in the storyline were unexpected but greatly received. Buy the game, hopefully they will bring out a sequel.
reviews.author: Lisa Bennington

reviews.title: Don\'t Second Guess
reviews.comment: Ive been eyeing this game for awhile now and immediately bought when it went on sale. Money well spent. Great story and gameplay. Point and click goodness. Probably the best one on Android.
reviews.author: Juan Miguel Umali

reviews.title: Amazing Story
reviews.comment: Story line was so good I spent about 6 hours playing it the day I downloaded it. I really hope they make a sequel I would definitely pay for it.
reviews.author: Gianni Rodriguez

reviews.title: Super Crash!
reviews.comment: Seemed interesting at first but kept on crashing about every two minutes. Ended up uninstalling it. Total waste of money. Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Jacey Jarnagin

reviews.title: Great game until it won\'t let me proceed
reviews.comment: Was moving along and in the hotel room with phone if I try and call anyone to proceed with the storyline the app crashes.
reviews.author: Joshua Caudill

reviews.title: When is Yesterday?
reviews.comment: Paid for and downloaded game, it will not launch. Went to website for help or tips, not seeing any I went to \"Contact Us\" and stated issue however at the option box for platform...only two choices, ipad or iphone. Sorry I have an Android and not one of the \"sheeple\" that don\'t have a ipad or phone 12 or 13, I\'ve lost track how many versions there have been in the last hour. I\'ve yet to hear what I need to do...will I hear tomorrow how to fix Yesterday? Remember, free beer tomorrow?
reviews.author: The Coyote Quick
